page.title: 05NEW HOUSES IN WELFORD
page.content:
Mr Murphy uses modern building methods.Traditional wood is used for the wooden bits.Light weight bricks are used on the inside,heavy duty bricks are used on the outside to help for protection against very bad weather. There will be a tarred road with lots of little drives leading off to each of the seven houses. Each house will roughly cost Â£80,000 Before the houses were being built there were some old houses, a few cottages & a shop. A man in the Isle Of Wight owned the shop. They had to obtain planning permission for demolition & building before work proceeded.
{ BEN POLLOCK & GRAEME MORGAN}
